flawed_nl_solution:
There are 4/5 * 2300 = <<4/5*2300=1840>>1840 books in English at the library.
Out of these books, only 3/5 * 1840 = <<3/5*1840=1140>>1140 were published inside the country.
So there are 1840 - 1140 = <<1840-1140=700>>700 books in English published outside of the country.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1104, not 1140. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
